//: Made only for the sake of one of the new professions.
description: A custom made L12 Defender for one of Leadworks LLC VIP executives, its furniture was replaced with a more lightweight one to make wielding it with only one hand easier at the expense of more recoil. Surprisingly compact thanks to its moving barrel and forward-back pump mechanism. Like most other Leadworks products it doesn't accept third-party modifications.

//: Feed system and action inspired by the Gilboa Snake assault rifle.
description: Perhaps the pinnacle of overkill, OmniCorp Excidia is an automatic double barrel shotgun. Contains two improved chokes, magazines and mirrored ejection ports, but only one trigger: fire modes are set through a selector lever. Its action only supports double shots or full auto. Uses two stacked Saiga-12 or proprietary magazines.
//1: Shared gas port is as long as the barrels in this one, can't be sawn off. Same thing on the two gas ports of the 12-S.
//2: No other magazine-loaded shotgun besides Rivtech ones.

description: A less overkill, semi automatic version of the Omnicorp Excidia double barrel shotgun minus its built-in accessories and a double trigger instead of a fire selector lever, supporting single shots. Smaller thanks to its telescopic stock, but with greater felt recoil. Uses two stacked Saiga-12 or proprietary magazines.
